item.title: Xbox - Project Scorpio
item.description:
Xbox - Project Scorpio

The most powerful console ever. Holiday 2017.

item.title: Xbox One S
item.description:
Xbox One S

Introducing the new Xbox One S. Play the greatest games lineup, including Xbox 360 classics, on a 40% smaller console. Experience richer, more luminous colors in games and video with High Dynamic Range technology. Stream 4K video on Netflix and Amazon Video, and watch UHD Blu-rayâ„¢ movies in stunning 4K Ultra HD.

item.title: This Week on Xbox: June 24 , 2016
item.description:
This Week on Xbox: June 24 , 2016

On this week's episode we recap some of best Xbox moments from E3 2016 and what they mean for you.

item.title: MNR 572 After E3 2016 by Larry Hryb (Major Nelson)
item.description:
MNR 572 After E3 2016 by Larry Hryb (Major Nelson)

Larry Hryb, Xbox Major Nelson Gamertag: lollip0p Gamertag: Rubes Behind the scenes at E3 2016 Name The Game And more.

item.title: For Honor Trailer: Story Campaign Cinematic- E3 2016
item.description:
For Honor Trailer: Story Campaign Cinematic- E3 2016

Experience the world of For Honor in this cinematic trailer of the campaign. Playable in solo and two-player co-op, online and split-screen, For Honor's full-fledged story campaign is a tale of warriors in which players will live from the inside a crucial moment in the war amongst knights, Vikings and samurai.

item.title: Tom Clancy's The Division Trailer: Underground DLC - Expansion 1 - E3 2016
item.description:
Tom Clancy's The Division Trailer: Underground DLC - Expansion 1 - E3 2016

In DLC Expansion I: Underground, dive into the underbelly of New York with up to three friends to save what remains. Explore the randomly generated mazes of subways, tunnels, and sewers to fight deadly enemies and recover powerful loot. Experience an all-new incursion and find the latest weapons, gear and more.

item.title: Prey - E3 2016 Reveal Trailer
item.description:
Prey - E3 2016 Reveal Trailer

Announced at the 2016 Bethesda Showcase, watch the reveal trailer for Prey! Arkane Studios, the team behind the critically acclaimed Dishonored series, is bringing their unique vision to Prey, a first-person sci-fi action game that reimagines the franchise from the ground up... with an added psychological twist.

item.title: Tom Clancy's The Division Trailer: Survival DLC - Expansion 2 - E3 2016 [US]
item.description:
Tom Clancy's The Division Trailer: Survival DLC - Expansion 2 - E3 2016 [US]

In DLC Expansion II: Survival, SHD agents have run out of supplies in the middle of a harsh Manhattan winter and will have to survive as long as possible in a very hostile environment. Release Date: Coming Soon Find more on The Survival Expansion at thedivisiongame.com Get it first on Xbox One!

item.title: Valley Gameplay Trailer
item.description:
Valley Gameplay Trailer

Valley, in development from Blue Isle Studios, makers of the popular horror game Slender: The Arrival, promises a first-person adventure like none other. Players will pilot the L.E.A.F. exosuit, powering up their physical abilities to unheard of levels then exploring the massive world from above and below -- dashing over landscapes, leaping between structures, all while wielding control over both life and death.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands Trailer: Fight for the Wildlands - E3 2016
item.description:
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands Trailer: Fight for the Wildlands - E3 2016

In Ghost Recon Wildlands the fight against the Santa Blanca Cartel is just beginning. Watch the latest trailer and see how four spec ops experts will dismantle a massive and powerful drug syndicate. Ghost Recon Wildlands releases March 7, 2017.
